sources.title: Hard Time: Hostage Hotel | FULL MOVIE | 1999 | Action, Burt Reynolds
sources.description:
When a congressman's daughter is taken hostage in a deserted hotel, a disgraced ex-cop and his drunken ex-partner may be the only ones who came save her. The third film in the Hard Time series.

Burt Reynolds, Charles Durning, Keith Carradine, Michael Buie, David Rasche, Ted McGinley, Elizabeth Dennehy

Hal Needham
1999

Watch the rest of the trilogy on the Popcornflix channel
Hard Time (1998) - https://youtu.be/zVZIvwqguj8
Hard Time: The Premonition (1999) - https://youtu.be/36kL6LreQDg

metadata.Plot: A California congressman's wife and daughter are abducted and held hostage in a historic hotel and Logan McQueen (Reynolds) is rushed to the scene to assist his former partner, Charlie Duffy (Durning), who has been taken captive trying to broker the ransom deal. McQueen must risk his life to face the cunning killer (Carradine) and save the hostages and his long-time friend.
metadata.Actors: Burt Reynolds, Charles Durning, Keith Carradine
